rrassed by the

hing

LEGACY just nodded once, the m=
ovement, a simple movement of the head
and shoulders, but as with anything,=

=93Perhaps you would do well to study the histo=
ry tapes. You may find
other things of value as well.=94

Turning on a heel=
 LEGACY exited his chamber, and as he did so several
computer systems began=
 to power down and the lights began to dim as if

e that he was gone.

TORCA looked at PERCEPTOR=
, his optics seeming to bore into the ex
Predacon. Although most of the Max=
imals and Autobots were about the
same size, there was something about the =
Fuzors that just emanated
size, especially with ones like TORCA and NOCTORR=
O.

=93We will soon be sharing this with the rest of the crew, but we have
=
words with Lord Elder first.=94 TORCA=92s words were deep and yet
powerful,=
 his voice managing to almost echo in the hall they were
walking through.

=
NOCTORRO looked up at TORCA, =93Legacy will be joining us there too.=94

EL=
DER glanced between the two, clearly not understanding either, =93If
Legacy=
 is coming, why not the rest?=94

TORCA just shook his head. =93When Tuscon=
 is finished with his . . .=94
TORCA shrugged not quite how to put it, =93.=
 . . affairs and Rodimus is
finished with his wife we will assemble everyon=
e. And all will be made
clear.=94

There was sorrow in LORD ELDER=92s optic=
s as he looked back at
PERCEPTOR, =93Later then. Until then, just walk with=
 the others. I am
sure this is just something preliminary.=94

ELDER glance=
d at UPROAR, =93Until Uproar should be able to keep you busy.=94

ething we will have to work out.=94

ong way in settling some
